thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice location, small rooms.
thread.title_full: Nice location, small rooms. - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fefa-London
title: Nice location, small rooms.
text:
Me and my husband stayed for a week at the POD 39, we had a great time in NYC.
The hotel was in a great location and walking distance to many places of interest.
I booked a double room and I had prepared myself for a small room as stated in others reviews, I just wasn't expecting to be that small.
The hotel was very clean, so well done to the cleaning team.
Reception staff weren't extremely friendly but to be honest I found that most places and people in NYC were like that.
We had a few drinks at the Salvation bar but it was a bit pricey so did not come back.
Overall a nice stay, would recommend this hotel is got s good deal.
